/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their red brick facades adding a touch of color to the cityscape. Trees and shrubs are scattered along the street, providing a touch of greenery amidst the urban environment. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
